name: Kitsune Dungeon Maid
description:
Help Yuki find out the cause behind the day's strange incidents in her dungeon!

A short RPG Maker adventure mostly revolving around puzzles.

This game is originally from 2013, my first attempt at a narrative game. It started as a challenge to myself as well as RPGMaker to make a game using only the standard assets. This is the updated version from 2015 featuring more original art and other refinements!
